DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FIRST ROUND ; FACTS AND FIGURES
DOC.TEXT: GROUP_A at Rose Bowl United States : 2 Colombia : 1 SCORING SUMMARY Colombia : 1--1 United States : 1 1--2 First_half scoring--1 . U.S. , own goal ( Colombia ' s Escobar ) , 35th minute . Second_half scoring--2 . U.S. , Stewart 1 , 52nd minute ; 3 . Colombia , Valencia 2 , 90th . Shots on goal--Colombia 22 ( Gaviria 7 , Rincon 5 , Valenciano 5 , Valencia 2 , Alvarez , Perez , Valderrama ) . U.S. : 14 ( Ramos 3 , Stewart 3 , Balboa 3 , Wynalda 2 , Dooley , Lalas , Harkes ) . Fouls--Colombia : 14 ( Alvarez 4 , Herrera 2 , Valenciano 2 , Perea , Gaviria , Valderrama , Rincon , De Avila , Asprilla ) . U.S. : 7 ( Dooley 3 , Balboa , Lalas , Stewart , Wegerle ) . Times Fouled--Colombia : 7 ( Valderrama 3 , Herrera , Alvarez , De Avila , Valencia ) . U.S. : 14 ( Harkes 4 , Ramos 3 , Dooley 2 , Balboa 2 , Stewart 2 , Lalas ) . Offsides--Colombia : 4 ( Valderrama , De Avila , Valenciano , Valencia ) . U.S. : 3 ( Wynalda 2 , Lalas ) . Yellow Cards--Colombia : De Avila 24th minute . United States : Lalas 49th minute . Red Cards--None . Referee--Fabio Baldas , Italy . Linesmen--El-Jilali Rharib , Morocco ; Domenico Ramicone , Italy . Attendance--93 # 194 . LINEUPS Colombia--Oscar Cordoba , Andres Escobar , Luis Fernando Herrera , Herman Gaviria , Carlos Valderrama , Leonel Alvarez , Luis Carlos Perea , Freddy Rincon , Wilson Perez , Anthony de Avila ( Ivan Rene Valenciano , substitute , 46th minute ) , Faustino Asprilla ( Adolfo Valencia , 46th minute ) . GROUP_A at Silverdome , Pontiac , Mich . Switzerland : 4 Romania : 1 SCORING SUMMARY Switzerland : 1 3--4 Romania : 1 0--1 First-half scoring--1 . Switzerland , Sutter 1 , 16th minute ; 2 . Romania , Hagi 2 , 36th minute . Second-half scoring--3 . Switzerland , Chapuisat 1 , 53rd minute ; 4 . Switzerland , Knup 1 , 66th minute ; 5 . Switzerland , Bregy 2 , 72nd minute .
